Lexington-Fayette.Barrel House Distillery:
Barrel House Distillery is a small batch distillery located in Lexington, Kentucky, producing RockCastle Bourbon, Oak Rum, Pure Blue Vodka and Devil John Dark (aged) Moonshine.


== History ==
The distillery was founded by longtime friends Jeff Wiseman and Peter Wright in 2008 and is located in the historic James E. Pepper Distillery, which began distilling on the present day site of Woodford Reserve Distillery on Glenn Creek in Woodford County, Kentucky. They later moved to the current location in the mid 19th century before merging with the Buffalo Trace Distillery in 1958.
